title: We’ve Played Avowed: Hands-On Impressions - Kinda Funny Games Daily 08.22.24
description:
Go to http://hims.com/kindafunny to start your free online visit today.

Go to http://auraframes.com and use code KINDAFUNNY to get $35 off their best-selling frame.

Parris joins us to talk about his Avowed preview, Concord’s been in development for 8 years, and Callisto Protocol’s REDACTED spin-off.

This Saturday, August 24th, at 11am Nick and Mike are hosting the Grand Opening of the RazerStore San Jose! Come check out the new store and hang with them live, and in-person at The Westfield Valley Fair Mall, Shop 2103 for your chance to win $1000s in prizes including a Razer Blade laptop. RSVP ahead of time at kindafunny.com/razer
The boys are back in town! Friday August 23rd at 8pm, join Nick, Josh Maguca, and Mark Ellis live, and in-person, for a night of comedy at The Lost Church, San Francisco. This is one-night-only so grab your seat fast before they sell out! Head to KindaFunny.com/comedy for details and tickets!
Today after, KFGD, you’ll get:
GAMESCAST - Concord Review
The STREAM is Concord
If you’re a Kinda Funny Member:
You can get today’s Gregway
And you can get The Core in Review this afternoon, and tomorrow on YouTube and Podcast services.
Thank you to our Patreon Producers:Karl Jacobs & Delaney Twining

Time Stamps:
00:00:00 - Start
00:07:30 - Housekeeping
        -  The Roper Report   -
00:09:50 - Avowed Preview Round Up
00:31:08 - Concord was in development for roughly eight years, Firewalk dev confirms - Victoria Kennedy @ Eurogamer
00:44:00 - Callisto Protocol Dev Announces [REDACTED], a Roguelike Set in the Game's Black Iron Prison - Ryan Dinsdale @ IGN
00:49:53 - Monster Hunter Wilds Finally Removes Gendered Armor, Meaning Anyone Can Wear Anything - Ryan Dinsdale @ IGN
00:54:10 - Wee News!
00:55:50 - You‘re Wrong
00:55:58 - SuperChats
